summary: In this context, decane and chlorobenzene are both mentioned as volatile organic compounds (VOCs) being investigated for their pro-inflammatory potential in a study. The research aims to analyze the inflammatory effects of various aliphatic and aromatic compounds, including decane (an aliphatic compound) and chlorobenzene (an aromatic compound), across a wide concentration range. However, there is no detailed discussion of their specific interactions or comparative effects within the study.
